arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Besiktas: Ernest Nuamah on the bench, Saïd Benrahma to start
arts.sum: Olympique Lyonnais don’t have any considerable injury concerns as they look to continue their winning start to their UEFA Europa League campaign, against Besiktas. With an almost complete squad to…

arts.ttl: ‘Ready for round 2?’ – Lyon limit sales for Besiktas clash due to safety concerns
arts.sum: Tickets for Olympique Lyonnais’ clash with Beşiktaş in the Europa League tomorrow evening have been limited by the French club. According to a report by L’Équipe, the upper tier of…
